replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

Lol why are you bringing morality into this? You broke the rules, you got punished. Big fuckin whoop. Youre not a terrible person, you just have a little trouble controlling your emotions. Dont take it like some life lesson. Its just Riots rules. You failed to follow them and now youre dealing with the consequence. No need to be dramatic.
Ya. Going to play fortnite is a good idea. Please go do that.
If you had a previous 25-game restriction, a combination of "EZ," "bad," and "kid" could definitely push you into ban territory when combined with asking for reports.
Sadly being sexist and racist would bring you a promotion at Riot Games but being a ll bit toxic in their toxic competitive game allow you to get banned... aaaaaaaaaaaaaah such a nice company Riot...

You must have had previous punishments. This one game on it's own isn't enough to warrant a punishment to an account with a clean slate.

 As you get punished, your account gets placed on thinner and thinner ice, meaning something like this (that is on the more tame side even though it is still negative) will trigger the next punishment. You escalated your account to a 14 day ban, the next one _will_ be permanent.

 Asking for reports is considered player harassment. One report is worth the same as nine, just report the player at the end of the game and move on. There's no need to get other players to join you in reporting, it doesn't accomplish anything and can breed negativity in most scenarios.

Its the first ban,and why is considered player harassment to suggest your team to report him to keep this "community clean" and get this guy banned for destroying our experience and game,instead of banning us 14 days only for this reason just ban the chat,so we cant use swear words or other things like this,i think this ban should be for people who grief or go afk all the time.
You don't need to ask for reports. 1 report work the same way as 9 reports. More reports don't make people get punished any likelier or faster.

> [{quoted}](name=xChef69,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7xEeBmpj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-12-26T21:19:45.482+0000)
>
> Its the first ban,and why is considered player harassment to suggest your team to report him to keep this "community clean" and get this guy banned for destroying our experience and game,instead of banning us 14 days only for this reason just ban the chat,so we cant use swear words or other things like this,i think this ban should be for people who grief or go afk all the time.

 Was it your first _ban_ or your first _punishment_? The punishment ladder goes: 

* 10 Game Chat Restriction
* 25 Game Chat Restriction
* 14 Day Gameplay Ban
* Permanent Ban


 Was there anything else in your reform card? Hate speech such as homophobia or racism will result in 14 day bans immediately, but what you've posted here should have been a 10 game chat restriction at most if you didn't have any prior punishments.

 I'd suggest filing a [support ticket found here ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and explaining the situation if that was the case.

 Also, it's considered Player Harassment because it does nothing to help cleanse the community. Your report counts just as much as a hundred other people reporting them, asking for reports incites a bandwagon effect and will either cause fights between you two or involve the rest of the game in a small, trivial matter. 

 Permanent chat bans have been proven to not work in the past, it just led to other players griefing areas of the game by going AFK or intentionally feeding. Swear words are usually fine as long as they aren't directed at people, but I'd take that with a grain of salt.

You know full well that wasn't what you were banned for-please don't try to spread false information. If you wish to actually discuss your punishment then please make a thread and post your entire unedited Reform Card in it.

To be 100% honest, a 14 day ban and being unable to loot for a year is what chilled me out when it comes to this game. It's taken me a very long time but I am almost back to honor level 3, have all my loot privileges back and to my knowledge have received zero reports. I can prove that not tilting improves your play a TON: since practicing in pre-season I'm at a win rate of 68% overall with a 3.15 KDA as a support main.

You gotta relax some man. I know it's hard, trust me. But it's not worth a permanent ban, especially if you've invested real money into your account.
